item.title: Five amazing indie videogames @BonusStage 2018
item.author: davcri91@gmail.com (Davide Cristini)
item.description:
A cozy gaming bar filled with passionate game developers showing their creations. These are the essential words to describe the Bonus Stage event.

It’s Sunday 15 April, the last day of the London Games Week.
I take the bus, heading to Dalston where the Loading bar is full of shiny games to try. I’m just arrived and, after opening the door, I discover a real paradise.

item.title: QEMU: quick guide to a powerful virtualization tool
item.author: davcri91@gmail.com (Davide Cristini)
item.description: Sometimes you want to try a new operating system or particular software configuration, but you don’t want to touch your precious PC, risking to make your main production system unbootable. In these cases, software virtualization is your friend.
